Introduction
This topic contains information on transfer (redeposit) of PFOP funds, including
cases in which there are no heirs within permitted class for gratuitous benefits from PFOP
, and
record of transfer (redeposit) of PFOP funds
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section E  - Accrued Authorization and Notification
citation: Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section E
